players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice here. Charlie was found dead last night. We need to be very careful with our votes today and try to figure out who among us could be the mafia."
Diana: "Alice makes a good point about being careful. I think we should listen closely to what everyone says today and look for inconsistencies. Bob, what do you think about the situation?"
Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out immediately."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso - I'm the detective and investigated her last night. She killed Charlie. We must vote her out to win."
You: "Alice here. Bob, your claim is serious. Diana, how do you respond to Bob's accusation?"
Diana: "Diana here. Bob’s claim is clearly an attempt to frame me. Why would a detective reveal themselves so quickly and put a target on their back? I think Bob is trying to mislead us."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
